name: Space Surfer (MxGRRR)
description:
Fly around as a space surfer, slingshotting around the sun and planets to score points for style and drifting

WASD to move, space to warp

art assets all designed by Lee @MxGRRR

sounds all open source from freesound.com

a game designed as part of Code Lab 0 at NYU in Fall 2021
